pageProduct.name: Sukin Hydration Deeply Hydrating Biodegradable Sheet Mask 25ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Deeply Hydrate Skin For 72 Hours With Sea Algae, Hyaluronic Acid & Maize Complex.

Warnings

Avoid Contact With Eyes. If Irritation Occurs Rinse Immediately And Discontinue Use. For External Use Only.

Common Uses

Deliver Visible Hydration Deep Into The Skin With Our Concentrated Serum. With An Active Bio-Marine Blend Of Sea Algae, Hyaluronic Acid & Maize Complex To Deeply Rehydrate, Leaving Thirsty Skin Looking Plump And Radiant For 72 Hours. Our Sheet Mask Made With 100% Natural Cotton Fibres That Will Biodegrade Within 6 Months Of Usage.

Ingredients

Water (Aqua), Butylene Glycol, Glycerin, Lecithin, Hyaluronic Acid, Ascophyllum Nodosum Extract (Kelp), Saccharide Isomerate (Maize Complex), Alteromonas Ferment Extract, Glycosyl Trehalose, Hydrogenated Starch Hydrolysate, Succinoglycan, 1,2-Hexanediol, Hydroxyacetophenone, Pentylene Glycol, Sodium Citrate, Citric Acid, Sodium Benzoate, Potassium Sorbate, Fragrance (Parfum)*, Phenoxyethanol, Limonene*, Citral*, Linalool*. *Component Of Natural Fragrance

Directions

Open Packet, Unfold Mask And Apply To Your Face. Leave On For 15 To 30 Minutes And Then Gently Remove. Massage Remaining Serum Into Your Skin. Don’T Forget To Recycle This Packaging!
